titleSection.name: VersionOne IBM/Rational Team Concert Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Integrating VersionOne and IBM Rational Team Concert helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people.

descriptionSection.description: Integrating VersionOne and IBM Rational Team Concert helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people. This integration helps manage overlap between tools with a two-way flow of work items so that teams can leverage existing project plans and status reporting, while adding the practice of agile project management.

qualityBands.name: commercial
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable and supported.
